title: New: Leisure – Follow Me (Keep Shelly In Athens Remix)
body:
Whilst we’ve not had a huge amount of original material from **Keep Shelly In Athens** this year, we’ve had plenty guest tracks and remixes to quench our thirst for their spaced out chillwave tunes.

This latest remix of **Leisure’s** _Follow Me_ turns what is a rather subdued, melancholic track into a languid, synth heavy number, far more suited for lazy summer afternoons than the original. Check it out below.
